headline: The Ultimate Biotech Stock to Buy With $500 Right Now
summary: Investing in biotech stocks isn't for everyone because the very nature of their business is fraught with risk.  As a result, biotech stocks can be highly volatile.  Here's why I think Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ: VRTX) is the ultimate biotech stock to buy with $500 right now.
